org.stekikun.dolmen.common

Class Prompt

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stekikun.dolmen.common.Prompt

  • public abstract class Prompt
extends Object
    Static utility functions to interact with standard input and terminals
    Author:
    St√©phane Lescuyer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Prompt.Colors
      Enumerates basic 16 terminal colors along with their ANSI color code.
      static class  Prompt.TermStream
      A wrapper around a PrintStream which may or may not support colored output via ANSI terminal control sequences.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputLine

        public static @Nullable String getInputLine(String prompt)
        Parameters:
        prompt - prompt line displayed
        Returns:
        the next line of standard input (blocking for it) or null if there is no such line (typically standard input was closed)

        public static String reset()
        Returns:
        the ANSI control sequence to reset text attributes
